sentences.en: a converter that allows you to view digital television on your old TV
sentences.cn: 让你可以在旧电视机上收看数字电视的转换器

sentences.en: A MEMS sensor research platform based on micro - converter AD μ C 832 is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出一种基于微转换器(Micro-Converter)的MEMS传感器组合研究平台.

sentences.en: A planar structure V band up converter has been presented.
sentences.cn: 介绍了平面结构的V波段变频器.

sentences.en: Another is the frequency converter drive inertia loads, there were pressure phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 另一种情况是变频器驱动大惯性负载, 而出现过压现象.

sentences.en: Even though this converter has 12 bits of resolution, only 8 are used in this example.
sentences.cn: 虽然这一转换器具有十二位的分辨率, 但在本例中只用了八位.

sentences.en: Horizontal converter is a new type of ammonia synthesis converter.
sentences.cn: 卧式塔是一种新型氨合成塔.

sentences.en: The air guards the catalytic converter from overload and possible resulting damage.
sentences.cn: 空气防止了催化式排气净化器的过载及可能产生的损坏.

sentences.en: The circuit structure is using a fly-back converter voltage.
sentences.cn: 这个转换器是利用返驰式电路架构实现。

sentences.en: The high level of HC in the exhaust gas may damage the catalytic converter.
sentences.cn: 废气中大量的HC会损坏催化式排气净化器.

sentences.en: The L. D. Process uses a top - blow oxygen converter lined with heat - resistant brick.
sentences.cn: L. D. 炼钢法使用炉内砌有耐火砖的氧气 顶吹 转炉.

sentences.en: The successive approximation converter is of medium speed, and average resolution.
sentences.cn: 逐次逼近式转换器具有中等的速度和分辨率.

sentences.en: The tap changer control system is important component of converter control system.
sentences.cn: 分接头控制是换流器控制系统中重要组成部分.

sentences.en: The transmission of an automobile engine is often called a " torque converter ".
sentences.cn: 汽车发动机是由 “ 转矩转换器 ” 来传送功率的.

sentences.en: This double converter arrangement would be expensive.
sentences.cn: 这两个转化器设备是昂贵的.

sentences.en: This is right medium or small converter steelworks is more appropriate.
sentences.cn: 这对中小型转炉钢厂比较适宜.

sentences.en: ZX series of products are the simple - type converter for family use.
sentences.cn: ZX系列 产品是供家庭实用的简易型电源变换器.

trans.tran_cn: [自]变换器，换流器，变压器，变频器，[冶]炼钢炉，吹风转炉，使转变[改变信仰]的人
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that changes the form of something, especially so that it can be more easily used
